statements: SELECT * FROM recipes
SELECT recipe_name, country_of_origin FROM recipes WHERE country_of_origin = 'Italy'
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, country_of_origin FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id <= 10
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE ingredients LIKE '%chicken%'
SELECT * FROM recipes ORDER BY country_of_origin ASC
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE country_of_origin = 'Italy';
SELECT recipe_name, country_of_origin FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT recipe_name FROM recipes WHERE instructions LIKE '%bake%';
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE ingredients LIKE '%tomato%' OR ingredients LIKE '%cheese%';
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT dish_name, cuisine_type FROM recipes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT recipe_id, dish_name, recipe_instructions FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT dish_name, ingredient_name, quantity, unit FROM recipes INNER JOIN ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = ingredients.recipe_id;
SELECT dish_name, cuisine_type FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_id, dish_name, recipe_instructions FROM recipes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE recipe_id = 2 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT recipe_id, dish_name, recipe_instructions FROM recipes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Mexican' ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT cuisine_type FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id IN (3, 4);
SELECT * FROM Recipe;
SELECT recipe_name, cuisine_type FROM Recipe WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT * FROM Ingredient WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT recipe_name, serving_size FROM Recipe ORDER BY serving_size DESC;
SELECT instruction_text FROM Instruction WHERE recipe_id = 'a1b2c3';
SELECT recipe_name, cuisine_type, serving_size FROM Recipe WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT recipe_name, serving_size FROM Recipe WHERE serving_size > 4 ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity, unit FROM Recipe JOIN Ingredient ON Recipe.recipe_id = Ingredient.ingredient_id WHERE cuisine_type = 'Mexican' ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, step_number, instruction_text FROM Recipe JOIN Instruction ON Recipe.recipe_id = Instruction.recipe_id WHERE step_number < 5 ORDER BY step_number ASC;

SELECT recipe_name, cuisine_type, serving_size, ingredient_name, quantity, unit, step_number, instruction_text FROM Recipe JOIN Ingredient ON Recipe.recipe_id = Ingredient.ingredient_id JOIN Instruction ON Recipe.recipe_id = Instruction.recipe_id WHERE cuisine_type = 'French' AND serving_size > 2 ORDER BY recipe_name ASC, step_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, cuisine_type FROM recipes;
SELECT ingredient_name FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_id = 1;
SELECT instruction_text FROM instructions WHERE recipe_id = 2 ORDER BY step_number DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM ratings INNER JOIN recipes ON ratings.recipe_id = recipes.recipe_id GROUP BY recipe_name;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT recipe_name, cuisine_type FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 3;
SELECT recipe_name, COUNT(recipe_id) AS total_recipes FROM recipes GROUP BY cuisine_type;
SELECT r.recipe_name, i.ingredient_name FROM recipes r JOIN ingredients i ON r.recipe_id = i.ingredient_id;
SELECT r.recipe_name, AVG(rt.rating) AS average_rating FROM recipes r JOIN ratings rt ON r.recipe_id = rt.recipe_id GROUP BY r.recipe_name ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Recipe;
SELECT name, cuisine FROM Recipe WHERE difficulty='Easy';
SELECT id, name, cuisine FROM Recipe WHERE cuisine='Italian';
SELECT * FROM Ingredient ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM Instruction WHERE step_number=1;
SELECT * FROM Recipe WHERE cuisine = 'Italian' ORDER BY difficulty DESC;
SELECT r.name, i.name AS ingredient, ri.quantity FROM Recipe r INNER JOIN RecipeIngredient ri ON r.id = ri.recipe_id INNER JOIN Ingredient i ON ri.ingredient_id = i.id WHERE r.difficulty = 'Medium';
SELECT r.name AS Recipe_Name, t.name AS Tag_Name FROM Recipe r INNER JOIN Tag t ON r.id = t.id WHERE r.cuisine = 'Mexican';
SELECT i.name AS Ingredient_Name, COUNT(ri.recipe_id) AS Recipe_Count FROM Ingredient i LEFT JOIN RecipeIngredient ri ON i.id = ri.ingredient_id GROUP BY i.name ORDER BY Recipe_Count DESC;
SELECT r.name AS Recipe_Name, i.name AS Ingredient_Name FROM Recipe r, Ingredient i, RecipeIngredient ri WHERE r.id = ri.recipe_id AND i.id = ri.ingredient_id ORDER BY r.name, i.name DESC;
